alert.note: Alert for Yavapai County Mountains; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 12 at 6:15PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...An area of moderate to heavy rain/snow will impact portions of Yavapai County through 645 PM MST... At 611 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking an area of heavy rain/snow mix near Cordes Junction, or 17 miles southwest of Camp Verde, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Moderate to heavy rain/snow. Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Reduced visibility and slippery roads leading to hazardous travel conditions. This includes Interstate 17 between mile markers 264 and 285, or between Cordes Junction and Camp Verde. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Reduce speed and turn on headlights! Sudden changes in visibility and road conditions are expected.

area.areaDesc: Yavapai County Mountains; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins
